subject: Weekend Work
content: Hi Liam, we’ll need your help over the weekend. Ethan is out and we’re counting on you to finish the backend module. Please be at the office by 9:00 AM Saturday.

subject: Quick Check-In
content: Hey Sophie, just checking in on your progress with the responsive layout. Let me know if you need anything.

subject: HR Forms Update
content: Hi, I've uploaded the revised onboarding forms to the shared folder. Let me know if further changes are needed.
